markdownRemark.html:
Rails follows a Model View Controller architecture, and this raises questions about code organization once the applications start to grow to a certain size.

  • No Fat Models - don’t allow them to get bloated
  • Keep views dumb - don’t put any logic in there
  • Keep controllers skinny - don’t put too much there

So, where would you put anything that is not a simple action?
